mapper.sql: id, struId, length, width, topElev, axisOffs, vert, surfVert, planeness, inteFaultTable, pierqualityCheckTime, isQualify
mapper.select:
select
from pierquality where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
mapper.insert: insert into pierquality (id, struId, length, width, topElev, axisOffs, vert, surfVert, planeness, inteFaultTable, pierqualityCheckTime, isQualify) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{struId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topElev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{axisOffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surfVert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planeness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inteFaultTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pierqualityCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isQualify,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into pierquality
id,
struId,
length,
width,
topElev,
axisOffs,
vert,
surfVert,
planeness,
inteFaultTable,
pierqualityCheckTime,
isQualify,

mapper.update:
update pierquality
struId = #{struId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
length = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
width = #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
topElev = #{topElev,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
axisOffs = #{axisOffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vert = #{vert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
surfVert = #{surfVert,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
planeness = #{planeness,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inteFaultTable = #{inteFaultTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pierqualityCheckTime = #{pierqualityCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isQualify = #{isQualify,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pierquality set struId = #{struId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, length = #{length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, width = #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, topElev = #{topElev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, axisOffs = #{axisOffs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vert = #{vert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, surfVert = #{surfVert,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, planeness = #{planeness,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inteFaultTable = #{inteFaultTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pierqualityCheckTime = #{pierqualityCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isQualify = #{isQualify,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM pierquality where isQualify= #{isQualify,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
select * from pierquality where id > 1 ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
select * from pierquality where struId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
select * from pierquality where struId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) AND (isQualify = 0 OR isQualify = 1) ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
select * from pierquality where struId LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')) AND isQualify = -1 ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
select * from pierquality where isQualify=0 OR isQualify = 1 ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC

SELECT isQualify,COUNT(*) AS 'count' ,SUBSTR(pierqualityCheckTime,1,10) AS 'checkTime' FROM pierquality WHERE pierqualityCheckTime BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND (isQualify = 0 OR isQualify = 1) GROUP BY SUBSTR(pierqualityCheckTime,1,10),isQualify
select * from pierquality WHERE pierqualityCheckTime BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} AND isQualify !=2 ORDER BY pierqualityCheckTime DESC
